bibl.note: Manetho as a Ptolemaic and Hellenistic historian.

bibl.title: Purposes of History. Studies in Greek Historiography from the 4th to the 2nd centuries B.C. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Leuven, 24-26 May 1988

bibl.seg: MENDELS Doron, The Polemical Character of Manetho's Aegyptiaca.

H. VERDIN, G. SCHEPENS and E. DE KEYSER (Edd.), Purposes of History. Studies in Greek Historiography from the 4th to the 2nd centuries B.C. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Leuven, 24-26 May 1988 = Studia Hellenistica. 30 (Lovanii, 1990) pp. 91-110; - 117-123.
